name: Talking Monster Girl HD
description:
Rebecca the Monster Girl wants to share all her secrets! The most daring and fashionable vampire wants to go shopping, dress in style and play with you!

Rebecca is a fashionable vampire, adolescent and fun with sharp fangs, pale skin and intense black hair. This monster girl loves fashion, so you could dress her with a great variety of outfits and accessories to go to school or to go party with her friends. Enter her wardrobe and guess all of her favorite colors!

She also has many surprises ready just for you!

Talk to her and she will repeat everything you say. Play fun mini games with your friends. Tap her to discover her secret animations, and take many fun pictures with Rebecca posing and share them all.

*HOW TO PLAY*
-Rebecca repeats what you say!
-Buy clothes and accessories to dress fashionably.
-Play jump rope with your friends!
-Find fun and surprising animations
-Make Rebecca into a cute little vampire
-Create personalized photos to share with your friends
-Record all the things you do with Monster Girl and send them to your friends!

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone o iPad must have a microphone or headphones with a microphone. If not, the option to repeat your voice will not work.
